ever_4: Put me in a bad light
ever_5: I replay my footsteps on each stepping stone
ever_6: Trying to find the one where I went wrong

ever_14: That this pain would be for evermore

ever_19: I rewind the tape but all it does is pause
ever_20: On the very moment all was lost
